sqlMap.select: select f_id, f_child_kind, f_achieve_count, f_character_id from t_character_achieve_count where f_character_id = #characterId#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_character_achieve_count (f_child_kind, f_achieve_count, f_character_id) values (#childKind:INTEGER#, #achieveCount:INTEGER#, #characterId:INTEGER#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.update: update t_character_achieve_count set f_child_kind = #childKind:INTEGER#, f_achieve_count = #achieveCount:INTEGER#, f_character_id = #characterId:INTEGER# where f_id = #id:INTEGER#
